name: labialize
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to pronounce a sound or sounds using the lips: This type of consonant is never labialised.
More examplesFewer examplesSpeakers of standard RP English commonly labialize /r/ if the following vowel has some lip-rounding.The vocalized variant has the sound of a back vowel [u] and may or may not be rounded or labialised.There are no clusters in Cantonese - \kw\ and \kwh\ are analysed as labialised velars.
